description: This file is the main application component for a React-based Tic Tac Toe game. It manages game state, handles user interactions, and renders the UI including the game board, status messages, and controls.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component that encapsulates the entire Tic Tac Toe app. Manages game state, user interactions, and rendering of UI elements.

methods.name: handlePlayAt
methods.description: Handles a player's move at a specific square index, updating game state accordingly.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the game to the initial state, clearing the board and setting the first player.
